# Pinellas County Water Quality {.unnumbered}

## Background

This dashboard is designed to make the monitoring results from Pinellas County Division of Environmental Management accessible and summarize how the lakes, streams, and coastal waters measure up compared to past conditions and based on regulatory and management targets. Content includes water qaulity information, red tide and beach bacteria data, annual reports, and data downloads.

## Dashboard

View the dashboard by visiting [https://pcdem.shinyapps.io/dashboard/](https://pcdem.shinyapps.io/dashboard/){target="_blank"}
